title: Abock Shoak
text: Abock Shoak is a Sudanese <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201984%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Welterweight">men's welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1984%20Summer%20Olympics">1984 Summer Olympics</a>. He was defeated by South Korean boxer <a href="An%20Young-su">An Young-su</a> in his first round fight.
